Journal.Title: Canadian family physician Medecin de famille canadien

Article.ArticleTitle: Integration of medical assistance in dying into family practice.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Clinical Lecturer in the Department of Family and Community Medicine at the University of Toronto in Ontario and is President and Co-founder of the Canadian Association of MAID Assessors and Providers.
